metadata.title: CVE-2021-47270 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: fix various gadgets null ptr deref on 10gbps cabling.This avoids a null pointer dereference inf_{ecm,eem,hid,loopback,printer,rndis,serial,sourcesink,subset,tcm}by simply reusing the 5gbps config for 10gbps.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
